title: Mathbox for Filip Cernatescu
content: I hope someone will enjoy solving (proving) the simple equations, inequalities, and calculations from this mathbox. I have proved these problems (theorems) using the Milpgame proof assistant. (It can be downloaded from ~ http://us.metamath.org/other/milpgame/milpgame.html .)

blocks.name: problem1
blocks.content: Practice problem 1. Clues: ~ 5p4e9 ~ 3p2e5 ~ eqtri ~ oveq1i . (Contributed by Filip Cernatescu, 16-Mar-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: problem2
blocks.content: Practice problem 2. Clues: ~ oveq12i ~ adddiri ~ add4i ~ mulcli ~ recni ~ 2re ~ 3eqtri ~ 10re ~ 5re ~ 1re ~ 4re ~ eqcomi ~ 5p4e9 ~ oveq1i ~ df-3 . (Contributed by Filip Cernatescu, 16-Mar-2019.) (Revised by AV, 9-Sep-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm problem2() {
  |- wceq(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, nat5), caddc, co(co(nat1, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, nat4)), co(co(nat3, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, nat9))
} = {
  3eqtri(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, nat5), caddc, co(co(nat1, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, nat4)), co(co(nat3, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, nat9), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0))), caddc, co(nat5, caddc, nat4)), co(co(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, nat9))
  add4i(co(nat2, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), nat5, co(nat1, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), nat4)
  mulcli(nat2, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  recni(nat5)
  5re()
  mulcli(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  recni(nat4)
  4re()
  oveq12i(co(co(nat2, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0))), caddc, co(nat5, caddc, nat4), co(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), nat9)
  eqcomi(co(co(nat2, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0))), co(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  adddiri(nat2, nat1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  recni(nat2)
  2re()
  recni(nat1)
  1re()
  recni(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10re()
  5p4e9()
  oveq1i(co(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)), caddc, nat9, co(nat3, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
  oveq1i(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0), nat3)
  eqcomi(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), nat3)
  df-3()
}

blocks.name: problem3
blocks.content: Practice problem 3. Clues: ~ eqcomi ~ eqtri ~ subaddrii ~ recni ~ 4re ~ 3re ~ 1re ~ df-4 ~ addcomi . (Contributed by Filip Cernatescu, 16-Mar-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm problem3(class c0) {
  |- wceq(c0, nat1)
  -| wcel(c0, cc)
  -| wceq(co(c0, caddc, nat3), nat4)
} = {
  eqcomi(c0, nat1)
  eqtri(nat1, c0, co(nat4, cmin, nat3))
  eqcomi(nat1, co(nat4, cmin, nat3))
  subaddrii(nat4, nat3, nat1)
  recni(nat1)
  1re()
  eqcomi(co(nat3, caddc, nat1), nat4)
  df-4()
  subaddrii(nat4, nat3, c0)
  recni(nat4)
  4re()
  eqtri(co(nat3, caddc, c0), nat4, co(c0, caddc, nat3))
  addcomi(nat3, c0)
  recni(nat3)
  3re()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm problem3(class c0) {
  ⊢ c0 = 1
  ⊣ c0 ∈ ℂ
  ⊣ (c0[+]3)= 4
} = {
  eqcomi(c0, nat1)
  eqtri(nat1, c0, (4[-]3))
  eqcomi(nat1, (4[-]3))
  subaddrii(nat4, nat3, nat1)
  recni(nat1)
  1re()
  eqcomi((3[+]1), nat4)
  df-4()
  subaddrii(nat4, nat3, c0)
  recni(nat4)
  4re()
  eqtri((3[+]c0), nat4, (c0[+]3))
  addcomi(nat3, c0)
  recni(nat3)
  3re()
}

blocks.name: problem4
blocks.content: Practice problem 4. Clues: ~ pm3.2i ~ eqcomi ~ eqtri ~ subaddrii ~ recni ~ 7re ~ 6re ~ ax-1cn ~ df-7 ~ ax-mp ~ oveq1i ~ 3cn ~ 2cn ~ df-3 ~ mulid2i ~ subdiri ~ mp3an ~ mulcli ~ subadd23 ~ oveq2i ~ oveq12i ~ 3t2e6 ~ mulcomi ~ subcli ~ biimpri ~ subadd2i . (Contributed by Filip Cernatescu, 16-Mar-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm problem4(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wa(wceq(c0, nat1), wceq(c1, nat2))
  -| wcel(c0, cc)
  -| wcel(c1, cc)
  -| wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), nat3)
  -| wceq(co(co(nat3, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c1)), nat7)
} = {
  pm3.2i(wceq(c0, nat1), wceq(c1, nat2))
  eqtri(c1, nat2, co(nat3, cmin, c0))
  eqtri(co(nat3, cmin, c0), nat2, co(nat3, cmin, nat1))
  oveq2i(nat3, cmin, c0, nat1)
  eqcomi(c0, nat1)
  eqtri(nat1, c0, co(nat7, cmin, nat6))
  eqcomi(nat1, co(nat7, cmin, nat6))
  subaddrii(nat7, nat6, nat1)
  eqcomi(co(nat6, caddc, nat1), nat7)
  df-7()
  ax-mp(wceq(co(nat7, cmin, nat6), c0), wceq(co(c0, caddc, nat6), nat7))
  eqtri(co(c0, caddc, nat6), nat7, co(co(nat3, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c1)))
  eqtri(co(c0, caddc, nat6), co(co(nat3, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c1)), co(co(co(nat3, cmul, c0), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), caddc, nat6))
  oveq1i(c0, caddc, nat6, co(co(nat3, cmul, c0), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)))
  eqtri(c0, co(co(nat3, cmul, c0), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), co(co(nat3, cmin, nat2), cmul, c0))
  eqcomi(c0, co(co(nat3, cmin, nat2), cmul, c0))
  eqtri(co(co(nat3, cmin, nat2), cmul, c0), c0, co(nat1, cmul, c0))
  oveq1i(co(nat3, cmin, nat2), cmul, c0, nat1)
  subaddrii(nat3, nat2, nat1)
  mulid2i(c0)
  subdiri(nat3, nat2, c0)
  eqtri(co(co(co(nat3, cmul, c0), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), caddc, nat6), co(co(nat3, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c1)), co(co(nat3, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat6, cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0))))
  mp3an(wceq(co(co(co(nat3, cmul, c0), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), caddc, nat6), co(co(nat3, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat6, cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)))), wcel(co(nat3, cmul, c0), cc), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cc), wcel(nat6, cc))
  mulcli(nat3, c0)
  mulcli(nat2, c0)
  subadd23(co(nat3, cmul, c0), co(nat2, cmul, c0), nat6)
  eqcomi(co(co(nat3, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat6, cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0))), co(co(nat3, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c1)))
  oveq2i(co(nat3, cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, c1), co(nat6, cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)))
  eqcomi(co(nat2, cmul, c1), co(nat6, cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)))
  eqtri(co(nat6, cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), co(nat2, cmul, c1), co(co(nat3, cmul, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, nat2)))
  eqcomi(co(nat6, cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), co(co(nat3, cmul, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, nat2)))
  oveq12i(co(nat3, cmul, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, nat2), nat6, co(nat2, cmul, c0))
  3t2e6()
  mulcomi(c0, nat2)
  eqtri(co(co(nat3, cmul, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, c1), co(co(nat3, cmin, c0), cmul, nat2))
  eqcomi(co(co(nat3, cmul, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, nat2)), co(co(nat3, cmin, c0), cmul, nat2))
  subdiri(nat3, c0, nat2)
  eqtri(co(co(nat3, cmin, c0), cmul, nat2), co(nat2, cmul, c1), co(nat2, cmul, co(nat3, cmin, c0)))
  eqcomi(co(co(nat3, cmin, c0), cmul, nat2), co(nat2, cmul, co(nat3, cmin, c0)))
  mulcomi(nat2, co(nat3, cmin, c0))
  subcli(nat3, c0)
  eqcomi(co(nat2, cmul, co(nat3, cmin, c0)), co(nat2, cmul, c1))
  oveq2i(nat2, cmul, c1, co(nat3, cmin, c0))
  eqcomi(c1, co(nat3, cmin, c0))
  subaddrii(nat3, c0, c1)
  biimpri(wceq(co(c0, caddc, nat6), nat7), wceq(co(nat7, cmin, nat6), c0))
  subadd2i(nat7, nat6, c0)
  recni(nat7)
  7re()
  recni(nat6)
  6re()
  ax-mp(wceq(co(nat3, cmin, nat1), nat2), wceq(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), nat3))
  eqcomi(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), nat3)
  df-3()
  biimpri(wceq(co(nat2, caddc, nat1), nat3), wceq(co(nat3, cmin, nat1), nat2))
  subadd2i(nat3, nat1, nat2)
  3cn()
  ax-1cn()
  2cn()
}

blocks.name: problem5
blocks.content: Practice problem 5. Clues: ~ 3brtr3i ~ mpbi ~ breqtri ~ ltaddsubi ~ remulcli ~ 2re ~ 3re ~ 9re ~ eqcomi ~ mvlladdi 3cn ~ 6cn ~ eqtr3i ~ 6p3e9 ~ addcomi ~ ltdiv1ii ~ 6re ~ nngt0i ~ 2nn ~ divcan3i ~ recni ~ 2cn ~ 2ne0 ~ mpbir ~ eqtri ~ mulcomi ~ 3t2e6 ~ divmuli . (Contributed by Filip Cernatescu, 16-Mar-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm problem5(class c0) {
  |- wbr(c0, clt, nat3)
  -| wcel(c0, cr)
  -| wbr(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat3), clt, nat9)
} = {
  3brtr3i(c0, clt, nat3, co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cdiv, nat2), co(nat6, cdiv, nat2))
  mpbi(wbr(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cdiv, nat2), clt, co(nat6, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(nat2, cmul, c0), clt, nat6))
  breqtri(co(nat2, cmul, c0), clt, nat6, co(nat9, cmin, nat3))
  mpbi(wbr(co(nat2, cmul, c0), clt, co(nat9, cmin, nat3)), wbr(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), caddc, nat3), clt, nat9))
  ltaddsubi(co(nat2, cmul, c0), nat3, nat9)
  3re()
  9re()
  eqcomi(co(nat9, cmin, nat3), nat6)
  mvlladdi(nat6, nat9, nat3)
  eqcomi(co(nat3, caddc, nat6), nat9)
  eqtr3i(nat9, co(nat3, caddc, nat6), co(nat6, caddc, nat3))
  6p3e9()
  addcomi(nat6, nat3)
  ltdiv1ii(co(nat2, cmul, c0), nat6, nat2)
  remulcli(nat2, c0)
  6re()
  2re()
  nngt0i(nat2)
  2nn()
  divcan3i(nat2, c0)
  recni(c0)
  mpbir(wceq(co(nat6, cdiv, nat2), nat3), wceq(co(nat2, cmul, nat3), nat6))
  eqtri(co(nat2, cmul, nat3), nat6, co(nat3, cmul, nat2))
  mulcomi(nat2, nat3)
  3t2e6()
  divmuli(nat6, nat2, nat3)
  6cn()
  2cn()
  3cn()
  2ne0()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm problem5(class c0) {
  ⊢ c0[<]3
  ⊣ c0 ∈ ℝ
  ⊣ ((2[×]c0)[+]3)[<]9
} = {
  3brtr3i(c0, clt, nat3, ((2[×]c0)[÷]2), (6[÷]2))
  mpbi(((2[×]c0)[÷]2)[<](6[÷]2), (2[×]c0)[<]6)
  breqtri((2[×]c0), clt, nat6, (9[-]3))
  mpbi((2[×]c0)[<](9[-]3), ((2[×]c0)[+]3)[<]9)
  ltaddsubi((2[×]c0), nat3, nat9)
  3re()
  9re()
  eqcomi((9[-]3), nat6)
  mvlladdi(nat6, nat9, nat3)
  eqcomi((3[+]6), nat9)
  eqtr3i(nat9, (3[+]6), (6[+]3))
  6p3e9()
  addcomi(nat6, nat3)
  ltdiv1ii((2[×]c0), nat6, nat2)
  remulcli(nat2, c0)
  6re()
  2re()
  nngt0i(nat2)
  2nn()
  divcan3i(nat2, c0)
  recni(c0)
  mpbir((6[÷]2)= 3, (2[×]3)= 6)
  eqtri((2[×]3), nat6, (3[×]2))
  mulcomi(nat2, nat3)
  3t2e6()
  divmuli(nat6, nat2, nat3)
  6cn()
  2cn()
  3cn()
  2ne0()
}

blocks.name: quad3
blocks.content: Variant of quadratic equation with discriminant expanded. (Contributed by Filip Cernatescu, 19-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm quad3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wo(wceq(c0, co(co(cneg(c1), caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat4, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))))), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2))), wceq(c0, co(co(cneg(c1), cmin, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat4, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))))), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2))))
  -| wcel(c0, cc)
  -| wcel(c2, cc)
  -| wne(c2, nat0)
  -| wcel(c1, cc)
  -| wcel(c3, cc)
  -| wceq(co(co(c2, cmul, co(c0, cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(co(c1, cmul, c0), caddc, c3)), nat0)
} = {
  mpbi(wo(wceq(c0, co(co(cneg(c1), caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat4, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))))), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2))), wceq(c0, co(co(cneg(c1), cmin, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat4, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))))), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))), wo(wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cmul, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))), cfv(csqrt, co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat4, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))))), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cmul, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))), cneg(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat4, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))))))))
  mpbi(wo(wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cmul, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))), cfv(csqrt, co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat4, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))))), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cmul, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))), cneg(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat4, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))))))), wceq(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cmul, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))), cexp, nat2), co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat4, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3)))))
  3eqtri(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cmul, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))), cexp, nat2), co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat4, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cexp, nat2), cmul, co(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2))), cexp, nat2)), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cexp, nat2), cmul, co(co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat4, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cexp, nat2))))
  sqmuli(co(nat2, cmul, c2), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2))))
  oveq2i(co(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cexp, nat2), cmul, co(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2))), cexp, nat2), co(co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat4, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cexp, nat2)))
  3eqtri(co(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2))), cexp, nat2), co(co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat4, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cexp, nat2)), co(co(cneg(c3), cdiv, c2), caddc, co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)), cexp, nat2)), co(co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cneg(c3), cdiv, c2)))
  eqtri(co(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2))), cexp, nat2), co(co(cneg(c3), cdiv, c2), caddc, co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)), cexp, nat2)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2))))), caddc, co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)), cexp, nat2)))
  binom2i(c0, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))
  oveq1i(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2))))), caddc, co(co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)), cexp, nat2), co(cneg(c3), cdiv, c2))
  3eqtr3i(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2))))), co(cneg(c3), cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmul, c0)), co(co(co(c2, cmul, co(c0, cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c0)), cdiv, c2))
  eqtr2i(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmul, c0)), co(co(co(c2, cmul, co(c0, cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c0)), cdiv, c2), co(co(co(c2, cmul, co(c0, cexp, nat2)), cdiv, c2), caddc, co(co(c1, cmul, c0), cdiv, c2)))
  divdiri(co(c2, cmul, co(c0, cexp, nat2)), co(c1, cmul, c0), c2)
  oveq12i(co(co(c2, cmul, co(c0, cexp, nat2)), cdiv, c2), caddc, co(co(c1, cmul, c0), cdiv, c2), co(c0, cexp, nat2), co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmul, c0))
  divcan3i(c2, co(c0, cexp, nat2))
  div23i(c1, c0, c2)
  oveq2i(co(c0, cexp, nat2), caddc, co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmul, c0), co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))))
  3eqtr2i(co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cmul, c0), co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), cdiv, nat2)))
  mulcomi(co(c1, cdiv, c2), c0)
  divcan2i(nat2, co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2)))
  mulcli(c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2))
  oveq2i(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), cdiv, nat2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2))))
  eqtri(co(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), cdiv, nat2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, c2))), co(c0, cmul, co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cdiv, nat2)))
  divassi(c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2), nat2)
  divcli(c1, c2)
